simplified: 授人以鱼不如授人以渔

pronunciation.pinyin: shòu rén yǐ yú bù rú shòu rén yǐ yú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shou4 ren2 yi3 yu2 bu4 ru2 shou4 ren2 yi3 yu2

details.simplified: 授人以鱼不如授人以渔
details.traditional: 授人以魚不如授人以漁

meanings.value: give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime
